item.description:
Oh, the pressure! My guests keep asking for coffee and I just didn't have the equipment or product to provide. But that is the past!

I have acquired excellent coffee brewing equipment, old school no little packets and electronic gadgetry for me.

Then I set off on my quest to find fresh roasted coffee in the Hartford area that was good enough to serve; remember folks I am from San Francisco and we fog-bound northern west coasters take our coffee very seriously.

Success!

Jose' Rene' Marinez Onofre, owner of J. Rene' Coffee Roasters is a practicing Ct attorney who roasts outstanding coffee in West Hartford and runs the Makris Midtown Diner in Wethersfield.

Such a busy guy can't do everything at once so coffee roasting is only done on Saturdays and the facility is only open to the public from 10 to 1 on Saturdays. He has agreed to give our group a coffee roasting seminar after they close on Saturday, March 13.

This won't be a long event, so plan on an hour or so. Plenty of time to do other things that afternoon and evening.

Because space is limited in the roasting facility, I am limiting this event to 10 cooking club members (no guests).

Wake up and smell the coffee!
item.how_to_find_us: I am the one that looks like me.
item.name: Wake up and smell the COFFEE
